solution_line_template: The number of students in the marching band is {total_students} / {marching_band_divisor} = <<{total_students}/{marching_band_divisor}={marching_band_students}>>{marching_band_students} students

The number of students that play a brass instrument is {marching_band_students} / {brass_instrument_divisor} = <<{marching_band_students}/{brass_instrument_divisor}={brass_instrument_students}>>{brass_instrument_students} students

The number of students that play the saxophone is {brass_instrument_students} / {saxophone_divisor} = <<{brass_instrument_students}/{saxophone_divisor}={saxophone_students}>>{saxophone_students} students

The number of students that play the alto saxophone is {saxophone_students} / {alto_saxophone_divisor} = <<{saxophone_students}/{alto_saxophone_divisor}={alto_saxophone_students}>>{alto_saxophone_students} students
